ViewObject.Name: VendMootDtVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT /*+ LEADING (h) INDEX(aps AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_U1) */ ai.org_id, ai.source, ai.invoice_num, ph.segment1 po_number, ai.invoice_date, NVL(py.discount_date,py.due_date) due_date, asup.vendor_name supplier_name, asup.segment1 supplier_no, aps.vendor_site_code supplier_site, :p_item SKU, (SELECT tv.target_value2 FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv, xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.translation_name = 'XX_AP_VENDOR_ASSISTANTS' AND tv.translate_id = td.translate_id AND tv.target_value1 = nvl(aps.attribute6,'Open')||'' AND tv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND sysdate between tv.start_date_active and nvl(tv.end_date_active,sysdate)) vendor_assistant, :p_all_excpt all_pending_s, DECODE(SIGN(instr(e.name,'/')),0,NULL,1,'D') discount, nvl(ai.voucher_num,ai.doc_sequence_value) voucher_num, ltrim(SUBSTR(hrl.location_code,1,6),'0') location, ai.invoice_amount, ai.attribute5 PO_Type, :p_front_door front_door_s, :p_non_code non_code_s, :p_drop_ship drop_ship_s, DECODE('','Y',1,'N',0,0) price_except_s, DECODE('','Y',1,'N',0,0) qty_except_s, :p_frt_expt fr_Except_s, XX_AP_TRADE_MATCH_UTL_PKG.xxod_tdmatch_quantity(ai.invoice_id) Qty_Hold_Amt, XX_AP_TRADE_MATCH_UTL_PKG.xxod_tdmatch_price(ai.invoice_id) Price_Hold_Amt, XX_AP_TRADE_MATCH_UTL_PKG.xx_ap_freight_invoice(ai.invoice_id) Frt_Hold, 'N' po_hold_chr, DECODE(SUBSTR(ai.attribute5,1,1),'F','Y','N') front_doorC, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ai.attribute5,1,1) = 'N' then 'Y' else 'N' end) non_codec, DECODE(SUBSTR(ai.attribute5,1,1),'D','Y','N') drop_shipc, ai.invoice_id, ai.attribute5, ai.gl_date FROM ap_terms e, hr_locations_all hrl, po_headers_all ph, ap_suppliers asup, ap_supplier_sites_all aps, ap_payment_schedules_all py, ap_invoices_all ai, (SELECT /*+ INDEX(aph XX_AP_HOLDS_N1) */ distinct aph.invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all aph WHERE -- aph.creation_date > '01-JAN-11' -- AND NVL(aph.status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND aph.release_lookup_code is null ) h WHERE ai.invoice_id=h.invoice_id AND ai.invoice_num not like '%ODDBUIA%' AND NVL(ai.validation_request_id,1)<>-9999999999 -- AND ai.creation_date>'01-JAN-11' AND py.invoice_id=ai.invoice_id AND (((NVL(py.discount_date,py.due_date) < SYSDATE + 8) AND (:p_all_excpt = 'N' or :p_all_excpt is null)) OR :p_all_excpt = 'Y') AND aps.vendor_site_id=ai.vendor_site_id AND asup.vendor_id=ai.vendor_id+0 AND asup.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id+0 AND ph.po_header_id = NVL(ai.po_header_id,ai.quick_po_header_id) AND hrl.location_id = ph.ship_to_location_id AND e.term_id=ai.terms_id AND exists (SELECT 'x' FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv, xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.translation_name = 'XX_AP_TRADE_CATEGORIES' AND tv.translate_id = td.translate_id AND tv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND sysdate between tv.start_date_active and nvl(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND tv.target_value1 = aps.attribute8) AND e.term_id=ai.terms_id
AND ai.org_id=NVL(:p_org_id,ai.org_id) AND ai.invoice_num=NVL(:p_invoice_num,ai.invoice_num) AND ai.invoice_num not like '%ODDBUIA' AND ph.segment1=NVL(:p_ponum,ph.segment1) AND ai.invoice_date BETWEEN NVL(:p_fr_invdate,ai.invoice_date) AND NVL(:p_to_invdate,ai.invoice_date) AND ai.gl_date BETWEEN NVL(:p_fr_gldate,ai.gl_date) AND NVL(:p_to_gldate,ai.gl_date)
AND asup.vendor_id=NVL(:p_vend_name,asup.vendor_id) AND asup.vendor_id=NVL(:p_vend_no,asup.vendor_id) AND aps.vendor_site_id=NVL(:p_vend_site,aps.vendor_site_id) AND nvl(aps.attribute6,'Open')=NVL(:p_vend_ast,nvl(aps.attribute6,'Open')) AND ai.source=NVL(:p_source,ai.source)
AND to_date(NVL(py.discount_date,py.due_date)) BETWEEN to_date(NVL(:p_due_fdate,(NVL(py.discount_date,py.due_date)))) AND to_date(NVL(:p_due_tdate,(NVL(py.discount_date,py.due_date))))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM ap_invoice_lines_all al WHERE al.invoice_id=ai.invoice_id AND nvl(al.inventory_item_id,-1)=nvl('',nvl(al.inventory_item_id,-1))
) AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv ,xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.TRANSLATION_NAME = 'XX_AP_TR_MATCH_INVOICES' AND tv.TRANSLATE_ID = td.TRANSLATE_ID AND tv.enabled_flag='Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN tv.start_date_active and NVL(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND tv.target_value1=ai.source ) AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 'x' from ap_holds_all aia where aia.invoice_id=ai.invoice_id AND aia.hold_lookup_code like 'OD Max Freight%' AND aia.release_lookup_code IS NULL ) AND (:p_frt_expt = 'Y' )) OR (:p_frt_expt is null or :p_frt_expt = 'N')) AND ((:p_qty_expt is null or :p_qty_expt = 'N') OR (:p_qty_expt = 'Y' and exists (SELECT 'x'--distinct invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all WHERE -- creation_date > '01-JAN-11' -- AND NVL(status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND hold_lookup_code like 'QTY%' AND release_lookup_code||'' is null )))
AND ((:p_price_expt is null or :p_price_expt = 'N') OR (:p_price_expt = 'Y' and exists (SELECT 'x'--distinct invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all WHERE -- creation_date > '01-JAN-11' -- AND NVL(status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND hold_lookup_code = 'PRICE' AND release_lookup_code||'' is null ))) AND (((SUBSTR(ai.attribute5,1,1) ='F' AND :p_front_door = 'Y' ) OR (ai.attribute5= 'Non-Code' AND :p_non_code = 'Y' ) ) OR ((:p_front_door is null or :p_front_door = 'N') AND (:p_non_code is null or :p_non_code = 'N') )) AND ((:p_moot is null and :p_nrf is null) OR (:p_moot is not null and not exists (SELECT 'x'--distinct invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all WHERE -- creation_date > '01-JAN-11' -- AND NVL(status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND hold_lookup_code = 'OD NO Receipt' AND release_lookup_code||'' is null )) OR (:p_nrf is not null and exists (SELECT 'x'--distinct invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all WHERE -- creation_date > '01-JAN-11' -- AND NVL(status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND hold_lookup_code = 'OD NO Receipt' AND release_lookup_code||'' is null ))) AND ((:p_disc is NULL or :p_disc='N') OR (:p_disc='X' AND DECODE(SIGN(instr(e.name,'/')),0,NULL,1,'D') IS NULL ) OR (:p_disc='D' AND 'D'=DECODE(SIGN(instr(e.name,'/')),0,NULL,1,'D')))
